Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Minutes from US Hwy 1

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Mystic Landing is a three-story office building offering new, high-quality construction, excellent access and visibility, and superior views of Mystic Harbor. The property is situated immediately off US Hwy 1, just to the northeast of Mason’s Island in Mystic, Connecticut.

Mystic is an affluent shoreline community and a regional tourist attraction, home to Mystic Seaport and Mystic Aquarium, which attract visitors from throughout the Northeast U.S. Downtown Mystic also boasts numerous shops, restaurants and historic homes. The town is nestled along a picturesque stretch of the Connecticut coastline, offering numerous recreational activities ranging from beautiful beaches to quaint New England boutiques.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Putnam Park is designed with all the amenities of a plush downtown high rise. It is located to benefit from the suburban advantages of quick and easy access, stunning river and city views and the convenience of free, ample parking.
 
The richly finished lobby features marble walls, floors and an impressive marble staircase. The building consists of 160,000 square feet of superior office space divided into a seven-story high rise and three-story glass atrium. 
 
The building is complemented by a bright and sunny cafe on the first floor which provides a wide array of choices for breakfast, lunch and snacks. Within minutes there is a wide selection of restaurants and shops in virtually every direction.

This two-story office building is ideally located less than 1/4 mile from Interstate 91 and is within minutes to restaurants, retail & shopping, banks and fitness centers. With a daily traffic count of 25,400 vehicles per day, this excellent opportunity offers a competitive lease rate from a hands-on developer landlord.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: The Meriden Executive Park is a signature two-building, Class A office complex with immediate access and visbility from I-91 that features ample on-site parking, outdoor seating areas and excellent views.
The Meriden Executive Park offers high-quality office space in a convenient south-central Connecticut location, with flexible floor plans and competitive rental rates.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE, Inc. is pleased to announce the availability of Class A office space for lease at the Meriden Executive Park in Meriden, Connecticut. Located at 530 & 538 Preston Avenue, the Meriden Executive Park is a two-building suburban business park boasting excellent access and visibility from Interstate 91, 4/1,000 on-site parking, outdoor seating areas, jogging paths and breathtaking mountain views on a beautiful 17-acre campus.

Availabilities include suites at both 530 and 538 Preston Avenue ranging from as small as ±2,500 SF to ±17,150 SF. Current tenants include USI Insurance, Transystems, Infinex Investments, Progressive, State Farm, Fusion LLC, Risk Placement Services and the U.S. Government. Asking lease rate is $19.50/SF gross plus electric.

For lease two suites available at Avon Wellness Center, a premier medical office building in Avon, CT. Since its initial construction and lease out, this is the first time space has been available at the building. Situated off Route 10/202, just one minute from Route 44, the property offers a convenient and peaceful suburban location within walking distance to local shops, restaurants, fitness center and daycare as well as the Rails-to-Trails recreational walking path. The building also offers prominent signage opportunities.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Premier Medical Office Space Available for Lease

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
OVERVIEWGREAT LOCATION, ONE-OF-A-KIND FACILITY

CBRE is pleased to offer Class A medical office space for lease at Avon Wellness Center/100 Simsbury Road in Avon, Connecticut. This one-of-kind, high-end, services-oriented facility offers amenities that raise the bar for leased space expectations. Built in 2000, this 65,000 SF facility is leased to a variety of medical providers including Hartford Hospital, Jefferson Radiology and Advanced Foot & Ankle. The first floor, 26,887 SF, HealthTrax space, can be used as-is or converted to medical space. Impeccably maintained, tenants and patients alike enjoy the clean, safe, convenient and inviting nature of this professional center. Situated off Route 10/202, just one minute from Route 44, the property offers a convenient and peaceful suburban location within walking distance to local shops, restaurants, fitness center, daycare as well as the Rails-to-Trails recreational walking path.

AVON WELLNESS CENTER MEDICAL/OFFICE SPACE

Architecturally distinct with its brick and slab construction, elegant new lobby, and glass atrium, 55 Post Road West enjoys river views and easy access to Westport’s vibrant shopping district. Recent renovations and expansions include the lobby, bathrooms, hardscape, landscape, covered and surface parking, and elevator. Flexible floor plates, possibilities for highly visible signage, immediate access to Riverside Avenue, and close proximity to I-95 and the Merritt Parkway make this family-owned office space a remarkable opportunity just steps from everything downtown Westport has to offer.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Merritt 7 is conveniently connected to the entire NYC Metro area, as well as all major thoroughfares in Fairfield County. New Haven and Manhattan are less than an hour away via the South Norwalk Metro North Station, while the on-site Merritt 7 train station offers additional service. The Norwalk Bus service is also easily accessible, offering dedicated transit service to all M7 buildings. With hundreds of new housing units under construction, along with arrival of The SoNo Collection, a contemporary state-of-the-art shopping destination, as well as other recreation and cultural attractions, M7’s rising status as a live-work-play destination continues to progress.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: As the largest and most prominent corporate park in Fairfield County, Merritt 7 boasts the amenities, accessibility and vibrancy of an urban setting fused with the serenity and growth of Norwalk. In addition to providing easy access to anywhere in the NY Metropolitan area, Merritt 7 boasts an unparalleled diversity of tenants and a variety of space options suitable for occupancy of any size or type.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: AMENITIES: Programming, Catering, Conferencing, Fitness Center, Dining, Salon, Car Wash + Detailing, Shoe Shine

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Merritt 7 is conveniently connected to the entire NYC Metro area, as well as all major thoroughfares in Fairfield County. New Haven and Manhattan are less than an hour away via the South Norwalk Metro North Station, while the on-site Merritt 7 train station offers additional service. The Norwalk Bus service is also easily accessible, offering dedicated transit service to all M7 buildings. With hundreds of new housing units under construction, along with arrival of The SoNo Collection, a contemporary state-of-the-art shopping destination, as well as other recreation and cultural attractions, M7’s rising status as a live-work-play destination continues to progress.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
As the largest and most prominent corporate park in Fairfield County, Merritt 7 boasts the amenities, accessibility and vibrancy of an urban setting fused with the serenity and growth of Norwalk. In addition to providing easy access to anywhere in the NY Metropolitan area, Merritt 7 boasts an unparalleled diversity of tenants and a variety of space options suitable for occupancy of any size or type.

Spread across a campus of six unique buildings, Merritt 7 contains over 1.4M sq. ft of LEED Certified, Class A office space. While each building has its own unique boutique ambiance and features, all are environmentally-responsible and fully equipped with in-building conveniences, flexible floorplates, and access to Merritt 7’s park-wide amenities program, interconnected outdoor plazas, and the Merritt 7 commuter shuttle.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Greenwich is an affluent town in Fairfield County, Connecticut, United States. As of the 2010 census, the town had a total population of 61,171. As of a census done by the Census Bureau on July 1, 2012, the town had a population of 62,256. Greenwich is the southernmost and westernmost municipality in Connecticut and is 38+ minutes by train (express) from Grand Central Terminal in Manhattan. In July 2005, CNN/Money and Money magazine ranked Greenwich 1st on its list of the 100 Best Places to Live in the United States. Money magazine also ranked Greenwich #1 in the "Biggest Earner" category. In 2012 Greenwich was listed as having the wealthiest residents per capita. The town is named after Greenwich, a borough of London in the United Kingdom.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 100 West Putnam Avenue consists of two multi-tenant office towers connected by a beautiful glass lobby. Each tower has four floors, totaling 155,000 square feet of rentable space. In 2016, 100 West Putnam Avenue was awarded the TOBY (The Outstanding Building of the Year) award by BOMA (Building Owners and Management Association). The property is a 10 minute walk to the Greenwich Metro-North train station, which has express rail service to Midtown Manhattan's Grand Central Station in 40 minutes. The property is also seven miles from the Westchester County Airport, 27 miles from the LaGuardia Airport and 32 miles from John F. Kennedy International Airport. The property's prime location on Greenwich Avenue provides tenants with numerous area amenities within the surrounding blocks. Conveniently located along West Putnam Avenue and near the Connecticut Turnpike, this office tower is ideal for any prospective tenant.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Greenwich Office Park is an eight-building campus on 21 serene acres easily accessible to necessities, amenities and transportation.

The vision for Greenwich Office Park was originally to blend a dynamic business environment with a natural, tranquil setting. That vision continues to be realized within the campus-like setting of one of Fairfield County's most prominent office campuses.

Distinguishing features include efficient floor plates with low loss factors, operable windows and individually controlled HVAC units. Beautiful landscaping, two fresh water ponds, on-site amenities and strong institutional ownership add to the appeal of these newly-modernized buildings located minutes from major highways and mass transit and within an hour of all major airports.

The vision for Greenwich Office Park was originally to blend a dynamic business environment with a natural, tranquil setting. That vision continues to be realized within the campus-like setting of one of Fairfield County's most prominent office campuses.

Distinguishing features include efficient floor plates with low loss factors, operable windows and individually controlled HVAC units. Beautiful landscaping, two fresh water ponds, on-site amenities and strong institutional ownership add to the appeal of these newly-modernized buildings located minutes from major highways and mass transit and within an hour of all major airports.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Windows on four sides. Pond views. Walk directly from the premises onto the green roof / terrace.
Pre-built unit with pond views, private restroom, high-end finishes and direct access from the outdoors.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Full service café with terrace seating serving breakfast and lunch
Complimentary door-to-train shuttle service during peak hours
Fitness Center featuring cardio, nautilus and free weight equipment
Tenant conference facility
On-premise catering for business lunches and events
Complimentary on-site parking

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Fully renovated building includes new façade, common areas and infrastructure.

Greenwich Office Park is an eight-building campus on 21 serene acres easily accessible to necessities, amenities and transportation.

The vision for Greenwich Office Park was originally to blend a dynamic business environment with a natural, tranquil setting. That vision continues to be realized within the campus-like setting of one of Fairfield County's most prominent office campuses.

Distinguishing features include efficient floor plates with low loss factors, operable windows and individually controlled HVAC units. Beautiful landscaping, two fresh water ponds, on-site amenities and strong institutional ownership add to the appeal of these newly-modernized buildings located minutes from major highways and mass transit and within an hour of all major airports.
171,926 RSF Sublease with robust infrastructure and redundant power. Divisions of space will be considered.
